fields.name: Off With His Head (1x, Charge 180%):
fields.value: Order the Headsman to attack your targets. This may be used on anywhere from 2 to 12 targets each night.

fields.name: Conscript (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if the Headsman dies. Choose a player who scored lower than you and they will become the Headsman.

fields.name: Viva La Vida (Passive):
fields.value: If you are among the last 3 Town players alive, or last 4 the day after using Off With His Head, you instantly die.

fields.name: Divine Mandate (Passive):
fields.value: You cannot be lynched. If you are hammered, the player with the second most votes will be lynched instead.

fields.name: Royal Hierarchy (Passive):
fields.value: This role is unique. You must spawn with The Headsman.
